title: Where are all my Skins, Champions and rune pages I bought?
body: I just am coming back from a long break and am using the same account. I log on to see none of them there. I have only been gone two years. I bought at least half of the champions and a good chunk of skins to go with it (as of 2013) . At least 300-600$ of items from Riot games. Now I log into my old account and it's all gone?! No email of me being ban or any kind of email to let me know I was refunded them. What is going on. I am considering to call my Lawyer as this is clearly stealing from me. I bought those champions and skins fairly and with my own cash. I did not receive a refund in of any kind. Can another User let me know what is going on? How do I get them back? This is really causing me to even reconsider playing again.

replies.body:
None of your content is missing, you're just logging into the wrong account.  This actually happens more often than you'd think.

I sent you an email verification request on the account where you'd purchased all your RP.  It should have your username in the email.

I would just like to point out something...

By singing the eula you agreed that Riot may remove your content at any time for no reason at all, so i don't think a lawyer could help much.

Nonetheless, I'm glad things worked out for ya.

Submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). It could take a few days for them to get to you. Don't bump the ticket or it will be pushed to the back of the queue.

Let me know what they say, because I've seen a few others have this happen and idk what the cause is.
I have but this really makes me mad. It's almost enough to just stop playing and take legal action to get my money back. I still have my receipts and everything.

When you pay 650$ you expect something to work correctly. When all records of the 650$ are gone and there is no reason.  Mind you 650. You earned and worked for. I am not going to sit by and just let Riot take my money and give me nothing for it. Not when I did not get banned, or break any rules. This is stealing at this point.
As Hollymonster said, you probably just logged into the wrong account...
